root.name: Cartoon Network Universe: FusionFall
root.description: Cartoon Network Universe: FusionFall is a browser based massively multiplayer online game (MMO). It was developed by Cartoon Network and Grigon Entertainment and uses the Unity Engine. Previously, you could play for free, but certain areas of the game were cut off unless a player payed for a subscription-based plan. In April 2010, the game become a fully Free-to-Play MMO.NPC Cartoon Network CharactersDexter's LaboratoryDexterDeeDeeMandarkComputressThe Powerpuff GirlsBlossomButtercupBubblesProfessor UtoniumAceHimMayorFuzzy LumpkinsEd, Edd n EddyEdEddEddyMay KankerMarie KankerLee KankerCourage the Cowardly DogCourageSamurai JackSamurai JackThe ScotsmanDemongoAkuThe Grim Adventures of Billy MandyBillyHoss DelgadoThromnambularGrimMandyDraculaJeffFred FredburgerCodename: Kids Next DoorNumbuh One,Numbuh Two, Numbuh Three, Numbuh Four, Numbuh FiveFatherToiletnatorStickybeardBen 10 Ben 10: Alien ForceBenGwenGranpa MaxKevinVilgaxHexShard TetraxFoster's Home for Imaginary FriendsBlooMacWiltEduardoCocoFrankieMr. HerrimanThe Life and Times of Juniper LeeJuniper LeeMegas XLRCoop
